price: Sunã kishingiɗe a kan karagu waɗanda ke cikin sahu, kuma Muka aurar da su waɗansu mãtã mãsu farin idãnu, mãsu girmansu.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مَّصۡفُوفَةٖۖ وَزَوَّجۡنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٖ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā sururin maṣfūfatin wazawwajnāhum biḥūrin ʿīnin
